9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.0ba5a7af-69dd-45d5-b8a6-4a78779ea8c5.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.149a34c1-4862-437e-bfe1-6278ed5bfc3a.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.1ea0960f-3387-4d47-b727-55ccd6f84d43.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.33e287d5-4ff7-4b35-a71c-5d6b1d70eff6.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.3b1dfbb2-32a9-42f4-a471-054409088e26.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.5ec20bd2-27b1-42ed-ad26-1f403c5cb1e2.prompt=Service\: 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.711035a6-7568-4f4f-a5d0-26d7805c8659.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.89909323-c94c-431b-ab7d-3549d1d63d8b.prompt=Alertnate Credentials - Password\: 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.a99fbea3-66c9-4222-b037-4d40a27577c7.description=Sleeps for X seconds 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.c3dc40f2-c31b-456f-9dc3-938abb5abc09.prompt=Alertnate Credentials - UserName\: 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.d5d1a122-9de6-49ef-9341-1b026ee7444e.prompt=HostName\: 9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.description=
Restarts a windows service

Inputs\:
host - The host on which the service resides.
service - The service to restart.
altuser - The username to user when authenticating with host.
altpass - The password to user when authenticating with host.

Responses\:
success - Service restarted successfully.
failure - Service could not be restarted.
service failed to restart - Service was stopped, but would not restart.
service didn't stop - Service failed to stop.
9cfaf270-c323-4802-9f70-6e1148b9cb6a.fad1b106-2790-49b1-b18e-28c106ce4ef6.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist
flow.name: Restart Windows Service

scriptlet.name: Step Set Global Context Value in Flow Restart Windows Service (ac5070d8-213d-48c0-9010-b325ed77a905)
